name: add_wireframe_section
description: Add wireframe elements for a specific section. Call this for EACH section defined in plan_wireframe. Generate all elements needed for that section.

section_name.description: Name of the section being generated (must match a section from plan_wireframe)

elements.description: Array of Excalidraw elements for this section

type.description: Element type. Use rectangle for containers/buttons/cards/images, text for labels, line for separators, arrow for flows, ellipse for avatars/icons, diamond for decision points.

width.description: Width in pixels (for rectangle, ellipse, diamond)

height.description: Height in pixels (for rectangle, ellipse, diamond)

text.description: Text content (for text elements, or label inside shapes)

fontSize.description: Font size for text. Use 28 for headings, 20 for subheadings, 16 for body, 12 for small text.

strokeColor.description: Border/stroke color. Use #000000 for dark, #666666 for medium, #aaaaaa for light.

backgroundColor.description: Fill color. Use 'transparent' for no fill, #f5f5f5 for light gray, #e0e0e0 for medium gray, #333333 for dark.

fillStyle.description: Fill pattern. Use 'hachure' for sketchy look (default), 'solid' for buttons/important elements, 'cross-hatch' for image placeholders.

points.description: For line/arrow: array of [x,y] points relative to element position.

label.description: Optional label to display inside/near the element
